title: Ice Diana is such a missed oppportuniy
body: I have such a feeling that team ice diana would have been such a more awesome skin than team fire diana. goddamnit doublelift and bjergson, I wanted Ice Diana >.<

replies.body: It doesn't mean we couldn't make an ice skin for her in the future!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=xJ2TRiZo,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-12-16T17:27:55.575+0000)
>
> It doesn't mean we couldn't make an ice skin for her in the future!

That would be so cool (hah...)!

I am so sad that Ice lost, as I was hoping sooo much for a frost-themed skin.

Another way would have been to make both skins and make one free for everyone depending on the winning team. Don't get me wrong, I am not complaining at all,I really liked the idea of making people want one team to win (and don't wanna sound like a spoiled child that always finds something to complain), I am just desperately looking for ways to make Ice Diana happen... :>

> [{quoted}](name=Insomniel,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=xJ2TRiZo,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-12-16T19:40:58.976+0000)
>
> That would be so cool (hah...)!
> 
> I am so sad that Ice lost, as I was hoping sooo much for a frost-themed skin.
> 
> Another way would have been to make both skins and make one free for everyone depending on the winning team. Don't get me wrong, I am not complaining at all,I really liked the idea of making people want one team to win (and don't wanna sound like a spoiled child that always finds something to complain), I am just desperately looking for ways to make Ice Diana happen... :>

i completely agree. Really wanted ice diana. It would have been such a cooler (unintentional pun) skin than fire. It fits her thematic so much better
Will it be fire Diana or could it be more like Solari Diana... cuz that would be awesome.
